prop.name: underName
prop.desc: The person or organization the reservation or ticket is for.

prop.name: dateIssued
prop.desc: The date the ticket was issued.

prop.name: totalPrice
prop.desc: The total price for the reservation or ticket, including applicable taxes, shipping, etc.

prop.name: priceCurrency
prop.desc: The currency (in 3-letter ISO 4217 format) of the price or a price component, when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

prop.name: ticketNumber
prop.desc: The unique identifier for the ticket.

prop.name: issuedBy
prop.desc: The organization issuing the ticket or permit.

prop.name: ticketToken
prop.desc: Reference to an asset (e.g., Barcode, QR code image or PDF) usable for entrance.

prop.name: ticketedSeat
prop.desc: The seat associated with the ticket.
